亰字的基本解释

亰
jīng
古同“京”。

亰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jīng］
［《廣韻》舉卿切，平庚，見。］
亦作“亰1”。
(1)高丘。
(2)大谷仓。
(3)即京观。
(4)国都。
(5)特指今北京。
(6)大；盛。
(7)数名。古代数位序列是：万、亿、兆、京。十兆为京。一说万万兆为京。参阅汉徐岳《数术记遗》。
(8)通“鯨”。
(9)地名。春秋郑邑，为共叔段所居。故址在今河南荥阳县东南。
(10)我国少数民族名。参见“京族”。
(11)姓。汉有京房。见《汉书》本传。

亰字的康熙字典解释

【子集上】【亠字部】　亰； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页89第07
【正字通】俗原字。◎按亰字《字彙》不載，韻書無考。《正韻》十一先收原邍，亦闕亰。《正字通》强增以爲亰卽原字，不知京、亰古通假，不必別生枝節。詳前京字註。

亰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
亰字的起名意思

暂无。

亰
Basic explanation of words
亰
jīng
Ancient Tong "Beijing".
亰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jīng］
["Guangyun" Ju Qingqie, Ping Geng, see. ]
Also known as "亰1".
(1) Gao Qiu.
(2) The big barn.
(3) That is Jingguan.
(4) National capital.
(5) Especially referring to today's Beijing.
(6) Big; Sheng.
(7) Several names. The ancient digit sequence is: trillion, billion, trillion, Jing. Ten trillion is Beijing. One says that 10,000 trillion is the capital. Refer to Han Xuyue's "Remains of Shushu Ji".
(8) Through "whale".
(9) Place name. During the Spring and Autumn Period, Zheng Yi was the residence of Gong Shu Duan. The former site was in the southeast of Xingyang County, Henan Province.
(10) The names of ethnic minorities in our country. See "Jing nationality".
(11) Last name. There is a Jingfang in Han Dynasty. See the biography of "Han Shu".
亰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Subset Part I】【The Department of Words】　亰; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 89 Page 07
[Zhengzitong] Vulgar original characters. ◎According to the word "Zi Hui" does not contain, there is no examination of the rhyme book. "Zheng Yun" first collected Yuan Mo on the eleventh, but also queer. "Zhengzitong" forcefully added that the original character of Qin Xuan, I don't know that Beijing, Qin ancient, and falsehoods, there is no need to have extra branches. Please refer to the previous Beijing word note.
